website_summaries.verdict: A basic, uncomplicated design that kids rave about – it's fast, better quality than most plastic sleds, and fun to ride solo or with a partner.
pros: This plastic sled is lightweight, easy for kids of most ages to use, and comes in 2 sizes, 33" or 48"
Tow rope is handy for taking it up hills
Speedy, especially going down steep inclines
cons: Some owners wish the plastic were a bit thicker, as it has been reported to crack – but it's still more durable than most in its class
Snow tends to come into the sled through the handle holes

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Too bad they are not available at present. I bought mine for use in my woodlot. The woodlot is on a hill, the last 50" are up a 50 degree incline. I bought this toboggan to mechanically haul 5" logs up the steep incline. Works great! I load 5 logs on the toboggan and up the hill it comes without a whimper. That's a lot of weight and it does the hob perfectly. It's strong, durable and dependable. Get one if you plan to use it on a snowy hill. It should last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Shattered into pieces before we even got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: jw480

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: High quality sled that was thicker than expected, especially for the price. My daughter was flying down the snowy hill in our neighborhood, way past all the "big kids". I was shocked that this little sled was so fast and thick. My husband and I even took turns and it held up just fine with an adult too. I talked to someone from Lucky Bums on the phone about a minor issue that they resolved promptly and generously. I hope to buy from this company again! They are a great business with high quality customer service.
customer_reviews.author: HipChickDigs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these last year when it snowed, but they came after the snow melted. Not a big deal. Snow here in NC is rare and doesn't last long when we do get it. However, a big storm blew through here Weds (1/17/18) and we finally got to use them. They're light, pretty sturdy and move like lightning. My only complaint is they are a bit narrow so they are very tippy. Makes for an interesting ride and fun wipe outs, but I would prefer to stay upright until the end of my run. I'm going to look for some sleds that are a bit wider in the rear for next year and hope we get another good snow.
customer_reviews.author: A Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is of low quality....it warped and is now permanently bent....would not recommend buying this product, esp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd LePine, MD

customer_reviews.title: Good sled, good size.
customer_reviews.text: If you have more than one child go with this size and not the 35" sled. Both are great sturdy sleds, but we misjudged how "small" 35" is versus 48". We really like this sled for all purposes - sledding, going for walks, picking up stuff at the post office or grocery store. We can fit two kids with a couple grocery bags in the middle of them no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten T.

customer_reviews.title: IT CAME WITHOUT THE PULL CORD
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed! Arrived with no pull cord. Wth? Ordered a replacement now I have to Haul the stupid thing to the UPS to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality product, that may ruin your vacation!
customer_reviews.text: We planed to do a trip from California to Washington and I bought two of this for my 4 and 7 years old kids. After arrival next day we went to mountains to sled on the snow. One of the sled got cracked immediately after my elder son sit in it. Ok, next couple of days were ruined because one sled were broken. We did return both items in one pack, but seller did refund price for one sled only. Do not buy this sleds, they have very bad quality. Also seller doesn't want to take responsibility for things he is selling. Going to escalate it further to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: razgon

customer_reviews.title: It's unbelievably strong.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to haul log pieces (18" diameter by 36" long) up a 45 degree slope. I assumed it would be crushed or cracked after a few uses. No so. It I flexible enough to ride over bumps on the hill an coming almost vertical with its load at the top of the hill. Has to be great for it's intended use. I strongly (pun intended) recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: We used this a couple times to go sledding with our toddlers. It is nice to have a sled that they can use together. It also makes good transportation for pulling them if the ground is completely covered with snow. The color is nice and bright, true to picture. The material is sturdy and I expect it will last their whole childhood.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Good size sled, fits adult and child.
customer_reviews.text: Great price (the pink sled was cheaper than the other colors) and fit my wife and 3 year old son. I got in and slid with my son as well. I'm about 5' 10" 185lbs and got some good speed. Highly recommend. Used it on the snow, looking forward to using it on the beach to haul stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and sturdy. I bought this to give my raccoons a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and sturdy. I bought this to give my raccoons a little pool to wade through and drink from. They love it. I have an older one that I still use at the other feeder and on hot days, which don't come this way here in the Pacific Northwest all that often, the raccoon lays in it to cool off. It's the cutest thing. But, I'm betting most people are using it for what it's intended for and I think it will work very well. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Kate KenworthyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and slick for sliding
customer_reviews.text: I bought two large sleds for my grand children, ages 4 and 7. They both had a ball with them. Easy to drag, fast sliding down hills, and take snow bumps well. A successful buy!
customer_reviews.author: MJ de CA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sled! Light
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sled! Light, yet very sturdy. The 48" size is just right for 1 adult + small child, and seems strong enough to hold up long enough for our grandson to ride on it by himself in a year or two. Easy to pull back uphill too.
customer_reviews.author: la critique

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sled
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun Christmas gift! Love the red, classic. Quick through the snow. Has enough of a lip for my toddler to sit comfortably in it while being pulled along. Large enough for dad and toddler to sled downhill together. It's a slick and dark red, not a matte red which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Little over priced but would buy again 100%
customer_reviews.text: Wanted sleds that would last more than one day. And I wanted something that would make it all the way down the hill. This sled did the job perfectly. I'm 190lb and my 5 year old went down together the entire day. The sleds are awesome. There were sleds breaking all over the place with kids that weighed half our weight. Our sleds went down the hill the fastest and further (once the hill flattened out). These are $25 sleds but has to pay $45 because of shipping. I waited a few months before buying because I was looking for the best for my money. Cheap sleds are slow and break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Cleare

customer_reviews.title: Great sled!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with this sled when it arrived.It seems very durable, not like a cheap plastic, and is nice looking as well. The size is perfect for a couple people. Easily fits an adult and a child or three young children can be packed on. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good price
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy for 2-3 kids. Sturdy and will hold up for years. Not a flimsy plastic like the ones in the store that break easily. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: carrie lee

customer_reviews.title: Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy! Larger than expected. Would probably be a great fit for my husband even. I am 5'4" and it was almost too big for me, but still perfect. Even my ten year old fit on there with me! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda_T

customer_reviews.title: fast and durable
customer_reviews.text: 3 years in this thing is still going strong and looks like new, and that includes runs with over 300 lbs of people on it. We had a string of one to five use sleds before this one and are very happy for a good fast sled.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago girl

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Bums = Poor Quality:  Beware
customer_reviews.text: We had the same quality issues that others have reported with the sled that we got the kids for Christmas. My son who is 12 and weighs 75 pounds rode it down a hill of soft snow (no rocks or other hard surfaces) just once, and it developed a crack on one of the bottom fins. So unacceptable. Focus on quality Lucky Bums and use the same highly durable plastic that the Canadiens like Garant use for their shovels!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Well built, durable plastic, fun for kids and adults. Only reason I gave 4 stars is the holes in the rear of sled. Maybe these were for adding a rope? My one year old son stuck his finger right in one of them and got stuck. Not a big deal, I pulled him free without to much trouble.....These should have had rope in them, or not be there at all, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Tracks nice, and very fast on hard packed/ice combo.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time in 2016 since we bought it in November of 2015 and it's fast, it track nice on hard packed snow, and okay on ice/hard packed. Haven't used it in dry snow yet, but I believe it will be okay. It's really stable and very fast. A little pricey for a toboggan but it works great so...I guess money well spent. rated for 150lbs, but I'm 160 and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Carfi

customer_reviews.title: ... for a sled that was more durable than the crap you get in stores and only lasts 1 - ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids because I was looking for a sled that was more durable than the crap you get in stores and only lasts 1 - 2 winters. Slides very well and fast, and you can easily tie multiple sleds together to pull the gang. I have managed to tie 3 together and do a 2 mile hike with the little ones in tow.
customer_reviews.author: P K

customer_reviews.title: Cracked during first use
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time we used it. The plastic is rigid which makes it prone to crack.
customer_reviews.author: TAKU TAIRA

customer_reviews.title: We had a blast with this sled. It survived ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a blast with this sled. It survived many hours of sledding without any damage. We had kids as young as 3 using it, up to 45 year old men and it worked for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: kids love!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for grass sleding on hills; kids love!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny L Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great sled but a bit pricy
customer_reviews.text: Well made! sturdy! we had lots of fun sledding in the snow. Fits for an adult and a kid. My only complain is that it's a bit pricy ($36). We bought a similar sled in the store and it costs half the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. shen

customer_reviews.title: Nice size; two youngster will fit easily as would ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice size; two youngster will fit easily as would an adult and a child. Feels as sturdy as the vintage one it replaces but likely won't have a chance to test it on snow this year. I expect it will hold up well unless one tries to run it over or into large, sharp rocks. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Bob from Chapel Hill

customer_reviews.title: I slides really well on the snow and the tow rope is perfect for pulling them along
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of young children and it is big enough for me to fit on it with them. I slides really well on the snow and the tow rope is perfect for pulling them along. I'm very happy with the purchase and would highly recommend it for anyone who has young children.
customer_reviews.author: Port370

customer_reviews.title: Big pink!
customer_reviews.text: In our recent snowstorm, I went looking for the biggest, pinkest sled I could order. This is a nice long sled suitable for big kids and little alike. It really made long walks over icy roads with my six year old a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: lucky diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Light, and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sled and got it right away. We love this sled. It is sturdy and extremely fast. It is big enough that both me and my 2 y/o daughter can fit comfortably in it. It is light and easy to clean. I highly recommend this sled.
customer_reviews.author: T&L

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks like good quality but I felt it was a little expensive. It was longer than I remembered when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Winter necessity
customer_reviews.text: This is our kids first winter with snow. This was a welcome addition -- they were quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Prof

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! It was easy for him to maneuver ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my six year old grandson's birthday. Luckily, it snowed the day after his birthday so he got to use it right away. He loved it! It was easy for him to maneuver and lightweight for carrying up the hill. Definitely recommend this sled for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Can hold three children at a time but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Can hold three children at a time but handles would be nice. says there are handles but there are none.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Durable sled, works for adults too.
customer_reviews.text: rode it on snow and ice, no cracks, and im an adult. Ripped the crap out of the foam based ones in a day, this lasts way longer
customer_reviews.author: David Adler

customer_reviews.title: sled worked well with an adult and a 3 year ...
customer_reviews.text: sled worked well with an adult and a 3 year old. The slopes were tame and the temps were mild.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: works for the beach too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this - not for the snow - but for the beach. Perfect for the beach. I put the cooler, the huge bag that carries all towels and beach paraphernalia, two beach chairs, and a 10 foot pop up canopy - this sled was packed but it handled all that with ease. It is heavy, so you will need a big strong man to pull it - or a sled dog, but it's easier than carts with wheels to maneuver thru loose sand. It glides over the sand and doesn't get mired like the wheels do. We've used it now two summer seasons and it still looks brand new. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ASR

customer_reviews.title: Tow rope not included
customer_reviews.text: Description said tow rope was included. Not for me. $41 for a piece of plastic and don’t even include the rope which was clearly part of the description.
customer_reviews.author: bmac

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This sled is great. It’s late enough to fit two people, including and adult and child. It’s alsl very thick and well constructed so it doesn’t crack over bumps, etc. will definitely buy another in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mowery

customer_reviews.title: Tippy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but not as stable as it needs to be. It tends to tip side to side quite easily, making it prone to dumping the rider over the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bork

customer_reviews.title: Great sled Durable Get it !
customer_reviews.text: Great sled and it fits my 10 yr old son and me on it and I’m 5’9 . Very happy with the purchase , feels durable . Highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka Bartoszak

customer_reviews.title: Solid, not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid construction----not like the flimsy toboggans I see other kids using.

customer_reviews.title: They love it and used it on the first day it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson who moved to Alaska for a few years. They love it and used it on the first day it got there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great & works well
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great & works well. So far we've used it with our 5 & 2 year old on the miniature slopes & we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice fast sled, but within maybe 10 runs it broke... I am not a huge guy either the plastic is just flimsy like other sleds, I was hoping for a little better quality but was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Good size sled
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to hold an adult male with two kids aged 3 & 6. We were crammed but overall a good sled.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sled. It's a nice size and not cheap looking. Just wish it had handles on the sides for our toddler but would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Big enough and sturdy enough to hold my 7 year old and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough and sturdy enough to hold my 7 year old and my 6'2 husband while sledding. Nice rope, and color is exactly like in picture. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, buy something nicer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two, one for my nine-year-old and the other for me. I'm about 155 pounds 5'7". While it fit my son fine, if there were bumps in the snow, it was very easy to tip over. Three runs in, I hit a reasonable sized dip, and the seat cracked.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sandler

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 6 year old nephew and he loves it. He can slid solo or with his little brother--it has enough room for two.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Sturdy.  Fun.  Fits 2!
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Works well. Fits one kid lying down, 2 kids sitting up and even one adult and one smaller child.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Alex

customer_reviews.title: This little toboggan is great! We intended it as a toy for our ...
customer_reviews.text: This little toboggan is great! We intended it as a toy for our granddaughter but it's a huge help getting bales of hay and sacks of feed across the pasture.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Arseneau

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to haul stuff on the beach. works great!
customer_reviews.author: Scotti T

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Bought it for my daugther
customer_reviews.text: This thing hauls! No problems at all picking up some serious speed on the hills! Good purchase. Bought it for my daugther, I spend more time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Splitter

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first day.
customer_reviews.text: This sled doesn't appear to be very resilient. It cracked after five runs across the bottom, including the ridges. The activity was simple sledding over mostly smooth surfaces. Time to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Evagee

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Bums snow Tobaggan
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this item, she just moved to Spokane, and there is plenty of snow.

customer_reviews.title: Great beach hauler!
customer_reviews.text: It felt weird buying a sled when I live in Houston, but this just upped my beach game considerably.

customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy ... Had 3 kids one adult on it fell and didnt break

customer_reviews.title: Is as expected
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to maneuver as far as I can tell. Would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for two small children. Works great on carpet, too!
customer_reviews.author: H. Kranz

customer_reviews.title: Great sled. My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great sled. My son loves it. We have used it a bunch and have had no issue. We have even had adults on it and had no issue.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. I was really surprised at how well this worked even on a trace amount of snow. I would definitely buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: My nephews love this sled!
customer_reviews.text: Very popular with pre-teen boys in northern New York snow country!

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son (10 yrs) to use at snow camp with the cub scouts. It was rocket fast and held up to hours of use, jumps, flips and all kinds of havoc that young boys can wreak. My one word of caution is this might be a bit too fast for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Barwis

customer_reviews.title: Got this for like $30. Went to Big R in town and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for like $30. Went to Big R in town and saw higher quality sleds for $20. Should have shopped locally first. These are a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: john baros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved it and it snowed in their front yard a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara in TN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lasted for 2yrs and then the ass blew out of it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It was the most perfect gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: It was the most perfect gift for my granddaughter, and actually I think dad liked it more, my granddaughter will have many years of fun. Well made very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R Wade

customer_reviews.title: We love to play in the snow and this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love to play in the snow and this is the best sled! I ordered $168 one from LL Bean and this $50 Lucky Bum one is superior. All our neighbor kids have the 48" one; it will even fit two adults comfortably. Plan to slide further and faster- great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sled for kids!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, slides great on snow, sturdy, with a decent length rope handle. This is a winner.

customer_reviews.text: Watch out. You will get the 33" one not the 48"

customer_reviews.text: The sled cracked in two after a few minutes of use.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a late Christmas gift for my niece & nephews! They love it!!

customer_reviews.text: Good hard thick plastic with a very slick bottom, works well in powder to the heavier wet snow. Where as other sleds don't seem to gain much traction. Good for kids

customer_reviews.text: Awesome sled - I wouldn't hesitate recommending it! The double is better for a taller person / adult. I just wish all sleds in general had better steering.

customer_reviews.text: Love the sleds. Granddaughters having lots of fun. Material and design is what I wanted. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy sled. Fast and fun. Better than the junk at the chain stores. Worth the extra few dollars.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item, Be careful they are shipping 33" sleds ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrong Item, Be careful they are shipping 33" sleds that nobody can fit on. Everything says 48", but the sled itself is actually 33", which is a cheaper model for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems great but it is a Christmas gift so is still in package.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great sled!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this sled once but it was an all day snow day. My 4 year old son and I made countless runs down some snowy hills and had no issues with the sled cracking or breaking. It was very sturdy! My son and I together weigh just under 200 pounds. It fit a child and adult comfortably. I saw a bunch of sled pieces littered here and there across the snow but the material of those sleds looked very thin. This one held up well and like I said, it's sturdy. If anything changes, I'll update my post, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: GUICK AND LIGHT WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: FLEXABLE ,FAST AND HANDY, LIKE OLD STYLE WOODTOBAGAN, IT IS FUN

customer_reviews.title: It's a sled... it goes downhill at ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a sled... it goes downhill at a rapid rate of speed causing boisterous laughter from my kids... 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W Keim

product_meta.title: Lucky Bums Kids Plastic Snow Sled, 35-inch Toboggan, Blue
product_meta.description: Whether they're new to sledding or have been sledding for years, the Lucky Bums Snow Kids Toboggan Sled is guaranteed to provide hours of fun. Made for a single rider, it is durable, safe, and ready for as many trips down the slope as you are! This classic plastic sled has built-in handles for your child to grip when the slope gets steep and the speed picks up. Grips are smooth so they won't cut or scrape uncovered hands.Our sled also comes with a pull rope, making it easy to haul up a hill or cart around your winter cargo. Single person toboggan sled measure 35 inches long. When you receive a Lucky Bums product, if you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, let us know. We are here for our customers and will respond promptly and professionally in order to fix any problems the product may have, if you received a faulty item, we will replace it immediately. Lucky Bums is a family business created by a love of the outdoors, when you purchase a product by us, you become family too.
feature_bullets: Your classic one person plastic sled with built-in handles
Durable plastic sled for hours of fun
Measures 48" long perfect for one or two riders
Includes a pull rope to pull the racer on a walk or back up the hill
Limited lifetime manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship
